title: ICE thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key'

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I was rebuilding `rustc` and I got this ICE after reverting some changes in the code base. I hopes this helps. Cleaning the build directory "fixed" the ICE. ### Code [rustc_target](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/tree/master/compiler/rustc_target) ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.59.0-beta.5 (28c8a34e1 2022-01-27) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder.rs:1617:13 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no entry found for key', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/decoder.rs:1617:13 stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/28c8a34e18fc05277c81328d1bbf5ed931f4d22e/library/std/src/panicking.rs:498:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/28c8a34e18fc05277c81328d1bbf5ed931f4d22e/library/core/src/panicking.rs:107:14 2: core::panicking::panic_display at /rustc/28c8a34e18fc05277c81328d1bbf5ed931f4d22e/library/core/src/panicking.rs:63:5 3: core::panicking::panic_str at /rustc/28c8a34e18fc05277c81328d1bbf5ed931f4d22e/library/core/src/panicking.rs:55:5 4: core::option::expect_failed at /rustc/28c8a34e18fc05277c81328d1bbf5ed931f4d22e/library/core/src/option.rs:1817:5 5: ::expn_hash_to_expn_id 6: >::decode 7: >::decode 8: ::with_position::<>::decode::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result> 9: >::decode 10: >::decode 11: >::decode 12: ::read_seq::, as rustc_serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode::{closure#0}> 13: >::decode 14: >::decode 15: <&rustc_middle::ty::TyS as rustc_serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode 16: <&rustc_middle::ty::TyS as rustc_serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode 17: as rustc_serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode 18: >::decode 19: >::decode 20: >::decode 21: ::read_seq::, as rustc_serialize::serialize::Decodable>::decode::{closure#0}> 22: >::decode 23: ::try_load_query_result::<&rustc_middle::mir::Body> 24: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_load_from_disk_and_cache_in_memory:: 25: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 26: ::optimized_mir 27: ::instance_mir 28: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_neighbours 29: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 30: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_items_rec 31: ::time::<(), rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_crate_mono_items::{closure#1}> 32: rustc_monomorphize::collector::collect_crate_mono_items 33: rustc_monomorphize::partitioning::collect_and_partition_mono_items 34: ::with_deps::<>::with_task_impl>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit])>::{closure#0}, (&std::collections::hash::set::HashSet>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit])> 35: >::with_task::>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit])> 36: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack::<((&std::collections::hash::set::HashSet>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit]), rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepNodeIndex), rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::execute_job>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit])>::{closure#3}> 37: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>, &[rustc_middle::mir::mono::CodegenUnit])>> 38: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 39: ::collect_and_partition_mono_items 40: ::codegen_crate 41: ::time::, rustc_interface::passes::start_codegen::{closure#0}> 42: ::ongoing_codegen 43: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> 44: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#1}> 45: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}> 46: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorReported>> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.59.0-beta.5 (28c8a34e1 2022-01-27) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu note: compiler flags: -Z macro-backtrace -Z tls-model=initial-exec -Z unstable-options -Z binary-dep-depinfo -Z force-unstable-if-unmarked -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=0 -C linker=clang -C incremental -C symbol-mangling-version=v0 -C link-args=-Wl,-z,origin -C link-args=-Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN/../lib -C prefer-dynamic -C llvm-args=-import-instr-limit=10 --crate-type lib note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `asm::msp430::::parse` #1 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items end of query stack error: could not compile `rustc_target` warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: build failed Build completed unsuccessfully in 0:00:07 ```
